titles: A petition delivered in to the Lords Spirituall and Temporall, by Sir Thomas Aston, Baronet, from the county palatine of Chester concerning episcopacy; to the high and honourable Court of Parliament.
author: Aston, Thomas, Sir, 1600-1645.
notes: Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
keywords: Church of England --  Government --  Early works to 1800.
